Name: Oh Ship Arena
About the game: This game is fast paced, heart racing, and progressive. Take command of your ship, step into the arena and test your skills. Dominate your opponents, collect star power to upgrade your ship, and try your best to beat your score and be ranked world wide. May luck be with you hero! GamePlay: This is a twin axis shooter. You are bound by an arena and have to defend off waves of enemy ships. Every enemy destroyed drops star power. Collect the star power to increase your score multiplier and also use the star power after the game to upgrade your ship. Star Power: Every star collected increases your score multiplier Stars can be used like currency to upgrade your mother ship 5 Different Play Modes! Ship Upgrades Include: Ship Health Ship Speed Ship Fire Speed Ship damage Ship Critical Strike chance Game includes Steam Leaderboard: Try to beat your best score and compare your score to others around the world Note from Developer: Another update delivered as promised! We are a small indie team and we are working passionately and hard to deliver the best experience we can for your entertainment. Thanks for your support. This is currently a single player game. We hope to finish the multiplayer version of the game if we can get enough downloads and support from the community.
